Text:
This was annoying... Had to extract CD 2 mid-wank. Rather spoilt the moment.

Word of advice, extract both CD1 and CD2 BEFORE starting your 2 hour long wank session. Opening winrar and extracting CD2 while aproaching climix was fucking annoying.

I mean for christs sake I was just about to cum all over my collection of printed out JPEG files. You know some of the old time favorites that needed a "personal" touch. Then all of a sudden the prono just fucking stopped and it hit me... "SHIT I DIDN'T EXTRACT CD2!", "FOR FUCKS SAKE I WAS RIGHT IN THE MIDDLE OF CUMMING WHILE IMAGINING JAMMING MY COCK UP THAT BITCHES ASS" I suddenly shouted god knows what the neigbours thought.

I mean god damn it what the fuck is the point in compressing AVI files anyway it took like 20 meg off the file. I'd rather wait a few minutes longer for the file to download that to fuck a good wank up opening winrar and extracting the second CD. GOD DAMN IT! Fuck this I think I'll open up PartyPoker and blow a few dollars to the pro players. $200 down the drain thanks to you rar compressing ass holes. Thanks a fucking lot.

QUOTE - "Pornolation Nation are not responsible for any harm, actual or hypocondric,
caused by watching this release" - Well it's a good fucking job isn't it?
Screw burning, just open in zoomplayer and have them set as a playlist one after the other XD
